definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: hook, on edge of curtains of tabern., matching the loops ([[לֻלָאׂת]], v. [[[לוּלַי]]]); pl. [[קְרָסִים]] Ex 26:6, Ex 26:11 = Ex 36:13, Ex 36:18, Ex 26:33; cstr. [[קַרְסֵי זׇהָב]] v:Ex 26:6 = Ex 36:13, [[נְחשֶׁת]] ´[[ק]]: Ex 26:11 = Ex 36:18; sf. [[קְרָסָיו]] Ex 35:11 = Ex 39:33.
